mapper.select: SELECT userid, content_id, donation, don_reg_date, FROM teamadonation WHERE userid = #{userid}
SELECT userid, content_id, donation, don_reg_date, FROM teamadonation WHERE content_id = #{content_id}
SELECT do.userid, cc.title, do.donation, do.don_reg_date FROM teamadonation do, teamaCreaterContent cc WHERE do.content_id = cc.content_id

SELECT c.userid AS userid, sum(get_donation) AS donation FROM (SELECT don.content_id, sum(donation) AS get_donation FROM teamadonation don GROUP BY don.content_id )cre, teamacreatercontent c WHERE c.content_id = cre.content_id GROUP BY c.userid
SELECT d.userid AS userid, sum(donation) AS donation FROM teamadonation d GROUP BY d.userid
SELECT sum(donation) AS donation FROM teamadonation

SELECT sum(donation) donation FROM (SELECT DISTINCT c.userid FROM teamacreatercontent c, teamamember m WHERE c.userid = m.userid AND auth NOT LIKE 'ROLE_ADMIN' )noAdmin, teamadonation d WHERE noAdmin.userid = d.userid

SELECT count(*) FROM teamadonation WHERE
userid IS NOT NULL

SELECT userid, title, donation, don_reg_date FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(teamadonation XPKTEAMADONATION) */ rownum rn, do.userid, cc.title, do.donation, do.don_reg_date FROM teamadonation do, teamaCreaterContent cc WHERE
rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} AND do.content_id = cc.content_id ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
